titleStmt.title: Upon the death of his late highness, Oliver lord protector of the Common-Wealth of England, Scotland and Ireland, and the dominions and territories thereunto belonging
titleStmt.author: Mayhew, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Edward Husbands, and are to be sold at his shop at the Golden-Dragon in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "As (sometime) fals the lofty cedar down,".
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Golden-Dragon in Fleetstreet
